definition[0]: a word meaning at any time; used mostly in questions, negatives, comparisons, or sentences with ‘if’
example[0]: Nothing ever seems to upset him.
example[1]: Have you ever been to Paris?
example[2]: I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.
example[3]: If you’re ever in Seattle, come and see me.
example[4]: Ever optimistic, I decided to take the exam again.
